00049 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051 Field* Field::newField( vector<string>* description )
00052 {
00053   string str;
00054   str = description->at(0);
00055   Field* field = NULL;
00056   
00057 
00058   if( str.compare( 6, 9, "TextField" ) == 0 )
00059   {
00060     try
00061     {
00062       field = new TextField( description );
00063     }
00064     catch( exception& e )
00065     {
00066       // Throw the current exception to the caller of this function.
00067       throw;
00068     }
00069   }
00070   else if( str.compare( 6, 10, "CheckField" ) == 0  )
00071   {
00072     try
00073     {
00074       field = new CheckField( description );
00075     }
00076     catch( exception& e ) { throw; }
00077   }
00078   else if( str.compare( 6, 5, "Combo" ) == 0  )
00079   { 
00080     try
00081     {
00082       field = new ComboField( description );
00083     }
00084     catch( exception& e ) { throw; }
00085   }
00086   else if( str.compare( 6, 9, "SpinField" ) == 0 ) 
00087   {
00088     try
00089     {
00090       field = new SpinField( description );
00091     }
00092     catch( exception& e ) { throw; }
00093   }
00094   else
00095   {
00096     throw FieldException( 0, "UNKNOWN", "UNKNOWN", "Input string was:" + str + "\n"  ); // throw Error: Type undefined
00097   }
00098   
00099   return field;
00100   
00101 }

00108 {
00109   return "UNKNOWN";

00112 
00113 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 
00115 vector<string> Field::getDescription()
00116 {
00117 
00118   // Create a string vector.
00119   vector<string> vec;
00120 
00121   // Fill in the different lines. 
00122   vec.push_back( "Type: "     + this->getType()   );
00123   vec.push_back( "Label: "    + this->getLabel()  );
00124   vec.push_back( "Required: " + this->boolToString( required )  ); 
00125   vec.push_back( "Reset: "    + this->boolToString( reset )     );  
00126 
00127   // Return the vector. 
00128   return vec;
00129 
00130 }

00184 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00185 
00186 bool Field::stringToBool( string input )
00187 {
00188   bool output;
00189   
00190   if( input.compare(0, 4, "true") == 0 || input.compare(0, 4, "TRUE") == 0 || input.compare(0, 4, "True") == 0 )
00191   { 
00192     output = true;
00193   }
00194   else if( input.compare(0, 5, "false") == 0 || input.compare(0, 5, "FALSE") == 0 || input.compare(0, 5, "False") == 0 )
00195   {
00196    output = false;
00197   }
00198   else
00199   {
00200     throw FieldException( 4 );  //throw Error: invalid convertion from string to bool.
00201   }
00202   
00203   return output;
00204 };
00205

00207 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 
00209 string Field::boolToString( bool input )
00210 {
00211   string output = "false";
00212   if( input ) output = "true";  
00213   
00214   return output;
00215 };
